channel.title: Need compiling help
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28)
It says that everytime i start my server. and when I try to sign in it says that my account is already logged in..Along with all the other people that try to log in.
Please help. I will give rep++

item.title: Need compiling help
item.dc:creator: @inmate1437 inmate1437
item.description:
@inmate1437 wrote:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException:

probably forgot a { or a ( or a ;

but im probably wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Need compiling help
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“mage ownt u, post:3, topic:193873”]ok download jdk6u5
go on eviromental vairables and put this in class path
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
next in path put
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
then on your compiler click edit ctrl+a delate everythign and fill with
@ECHO OFF
title Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

that should be ur compiler fixed :)[/quote]

lololololololol, There’s something wrong with your item.handler, you edited something wrong. Show me what you did. Mage ownt u, you have no idea…

Read full topic

item.title: Need compiling help
item.dc:creator: @mage_ownt_u mage ownt u
item.description:
@mage_ownt_u wrote:

ok download jdk6u5
go on eviromental vairables and put this in class path
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
next in path put
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
then on your compiler click edit ctrl+a delate everythign and fill with
@ECHO OFF
title Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

that should be ur compiler fixed
